text: Sorapong Chatree (; born Pittaya Tiamswate; 8 December 1950 – 10 March 2022) was a Thai actor. He was born in Maha Rat, Ayutthaya, Thailand. His career began in 1970 and he retired in 2021. Chatree was known for his roles in Out of the Darkness, Plae Kao and The Legend of Suriyothai. Chatree died on 10 March 2022 in Bangkok, Thailand from lung cancer, aged 71.สิ้นพระเอกตลอดกาล "สรพงษ์ ชาตรี" เสียชีวิตด้วยมะเร็งปอด ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Thailand Category:Thai actors
title: Sorapong Chatree
